actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Parks, Preservation and Recreation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation and Recreation

official_title: A bill to amend the Act establishing the Keweenaw National Historical Park, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior, in appointing members to the Keweenaw National Historical Park Advisory Commission, to consider the nominees submitted to the Secretary by the Governor of Michigan and various local councils. (Current law requires the Secretary to make such appointments from such nominees.)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act establishing the Keweenaw National Historical Park, and for other purposes.
